welcome:
Welcome to NPS Oracle Bot!

Link your NPS account to get Oracle readings, daily insights, and notifications right here in Telegram.

Quick Start:
1. Go to NPS web app -> Settings -> API Keys
2. Create an API key
3. Send: /link YOUR_API_KEY

Use /help for all available commands.
welcome_linked: Welcome back, {name}! Use /help to see available commands.
link_success:
Account linked! Welcome, {name}.
Use /help to see available commands.
link_failed: Invalid or expired API key. Generate a new one at NPS -> Settings -> API Keys.
link_usage:
Usage: /link <api_key>

Get your API key from NPS web app -> Settings -> API Keys.
link_invalid_format: Invalid API key format. Keys are 20-100 alphanumeric characters.
link_deleted_warning: Your API key may be revoked. Try re-linking with /link <new_key>.
help_no_detail: No detailed help for /{command}. Use /help to see all commands.
help_detail_time:
Time Reading

Usage: /time [HH:MM] [YYYY-MM-DD]

Examples:
  /time           -- Reading for current time
  /time 14:30     -- Reading for 14:30 today
  /time 14:30 2026-02-14 -- Reading for specific date+time

Generates a full Oracle reading including FC60 stamp, numerology, moon phase, zodiac, and AI interpretation.
help_detail_name:
Name Reading

Usage: /name [name]

Examples:
  /name           -- Uses your profile name
  /name Ali       -- Reading for 'Ali'
  /name Ali Rezaei -- Reading for 'Ali Rezaei'

Analyzes name using Pythagorean, Chaldean, and Abjad numerology systems.
help_detail_question:
Question Reading

Usage: /question <your question>

Examples:
  /question What does today hold?
  /question Should I take the new job?

Ask any question and receive a numerological yes/no/maybe answer with interpretation.
help_detail_daily:
Daily Insight

Usage: /daily

Get today's personalized daily insight including personal day number, moon phase, and lucky numbers.
help_detail_history:
Reading History

Usage: /history

View your last 5 readings with the ability to load more. Tap any reading to see full details.
help_detail_compare:
Multi-User Compatibility

Usage: /compare <name1> <name2> [...up to 5]

Examples:
  /compare Ali Sara         -- Compare 2 profiles
  /compare Ali Sara Bob     -- Compare 3 profiles
  /compare "Ali Rezaei" "Sara Ahmadi" -- Quoted names
  /compare Ali Rezaei, Sara Ahmadi    -- Comma-separated

Generates compatibility reading with pairwise scores and group dynamics.
help_detail_link:
Account Linking

Usage: /link <api_key>

1. Go to NPS web app -> Settings -> API Keys
2. Create a new API key
3. Send: /link YOUR_API_KEY

Your message will be auto-deleted for security.
help_detail_status:
Account Status

Usage: /status

Shows your linked account details: username, role, profile count, and reading count.
help_detail_profile:
Oracle Profiles

Usage: /profile

View all your Oracle profiles with names and birthdays.
help_detail_daily_on:
Enable Daily Delivery

Usage: /daily_on

Start receiving daily Oracle insights at your preferred time.
help_detail_daily_off:
Disable Daily Delivery

Usage: /daily_off

Stop receiving automatic daily insights.
help_detail_daily_time:
Set Delivery Time

Usage: /daily_time HH:MM

Examples:
  /daily_time 08:00
  /daily_time 22:30

Set when you receive your daily insight (24-hour format).
help_detail_daily_status:
Daily Settings

Usage: /daily_status

View your current daily insight settings: enabled/disabled, delivery time, timezone.
compare_need_profiles:
Provide 2-5 profile names for comparison.

Usage: /compare <name1> <name2> [...]
Example: /compare Ali Sara
compare_self_only: You need at least 2 different profiles to compare.
rate_limit_reading: You've reached the hourly reading limit (10/hour). Try again in {minutes} minutes.
rate_limited: Slow down! Please wait a moment before sending more commands.
error_generic: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
error_network: Couldn't reach the NPS server. Please try again later.
error_auth_expired: Your session has expired. Re-link with /link <api_key>.
error_not_found: Not found. Check your input and try again.
error_server: Server error. The admin has been notified.
error_rate_limit_api: Too many requests. Please wait a minute and try again.
status_unlinked: Not linked. Use /link <api_key> to connect your NPS account.
profile_no_profile: No Oracle profiles found. Create one in the NPS web app.
daily_not_available: Daily insight not available right now. Try again later.
daily_on_success:
Daily insights enabled! You'll receive a reading every day at {time} ({tz}).

Tip: Use /daily_time HH:MM to change the delivery time.
daily_off_success: Daily insights disabled. Use /daily_on to re-enable anytime.
daily_time_invalid:
Invalid time format. Use HH:MM (24-hour format).
Example: /daily_time 08:30
daily_status_not_setup: You haven't set up daily insights yet. Use /daily_on to start.
